summary:
As director/programmmaker for public tv  i worked for  
an artsmagazine, 
backgroundnewsprogramm, 
as editor foreign news main Dutch newschannel  and 
as documentarymaker .

Leaving the news I made & directed background-programms and  
documentaries(&series) for Dutch Public Tv and for other international broadcasters
 on social & political-economic issues i.e.
in war (Balkan), post-war (Eritrea) and post-disaster(Indonesia) situations
in countries like i.e. : Bombay and Tamil Nadu, Siberia, Aceh/Indonesia, Congo, Liberia & Sierra Leone,  Eritrea, Morocco and Egypt, US  and  Holland.

A lot of my work has been shown on international broadcasters and festivals.

Now working as an independent director and producer.

Documentaries i.e.:

"Africa: War is Business" 3-part series on Blooddiamonds  & causes of war in Congo, Sierra Leone & Liberia

" Atjeh after the Tsunami " on rebuilding Aceh and the role of Ngo's

" Bombay Jungle " on the bulldozing and rehousing of slumdwellers in Mumbai

" Klem/Stuck " over jeugdzorg/about juvenile detention in the Netherlands

" 24 uur Bedreigd/24 Hours Under Threat " on art and being a controversial painter with a muslim background

" Made in Madras/Dorst van Leer " on pollution by the leather industry in Tamil Nadu

" Sarajevo Film Festival Film "(producer) i.s.m, Johan van der Keuken on" how to survive a war and still go to the movies".

" Stalin had promised us a bridge" on the gulag in Siberia

Backgroundprogramms i.e:

" Het Wilde Noorden " Noord West Siberie,on gas exploitation and its consequences in Yamal Peninsula, Siberia

" Angst voor de Liefde " on Being Gay and Muslim

" Terug naar de Bron" Texas on George W Bush jr

" Jaren van Lood " Marokko on a political execution under Hassan II

" Bitter Paradijs " Eritrea, on the war with Ethiopia

" Mensenrechten in de Praktijk " on human rights & police doctors

" Het geweten van een politiearts " on coroners in Serbia, Indonesia and Holland
